forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the sun graces the city with a tentative embrace, peeking through a canvas of gentle clouds. The temperature hovers around a mild 63 degrees, offering a moment of warmth before it nudges downward into the early afternoon. A keen southwest breeze carries with it whispers of the ocean, swirling at 7 to 15 mph, with playful gusts testing the limits at 23 mph. Though sunlight bathes the landscape, the day retains that familiar San Francisco mystique—a delicate veil of fog linger, especially near the Golden Gate, signaling the persistent marine layer that defines this coastal enclave.

As twilight approaches, the skies will shift to a mostly cloudy tableau, settling around a cozy 55 degrees. The evening promises a snug atmosphere, ideal for an autumn stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet seat at a local café, warm drink in hand. Layered clothing is advisable; perhaps a light jacket over a breathable shirt will provide comfort as the daylight wanes. This day beckons for simple pleasures: a leisurely walk, perhaps exploring the nooks and crannies of Chinatown or enjoying the shifting views from Potrero Hill, all painted with the brush of a uniquely San Franciscan charm.
